page.title: 07Social Club, Prickwillow
page.content: {Mr.Ron Green}has been associated with the Club for many years, being treasurer for some fifteen years. 'The Club started 28 Years ago by employees who formed a fishing Club later they raised money to start a Social Club. Hiams agreed to support this venture by later donating a building on land just outside Prickwillow. Over the years we have had some famous Dance bands like the Marmalade and the Baron Knights. We are one of the few Clubs in a 30 mile radius where you can get live entertainment and Ballroom dancing every Saturday night. Members come from as far as Biggleswade.There are not enough members in Prickwillow to keep it going. The Club is open during the week days for Darts, Dominoes, Bingo and Bowls depending on the time of year'.
